title: [The Slope, Canyon Rim]
description: The path comes close to the rim of the canyon here, close enough to give a good view of the bottom of the canyon.  An owl circles, silhouetted against the night sky.  To the northwest, there is a small stand of trees, while to the east, a large outcropping hides the way.

The path comes close to the rim of the canyon here, close enough to give a good view of the bottom of the canyon.  A screech of a hunting hawk rings through the air.  To the northwest, there is a small stand of trees, while to the east, a large outcropping hides the way.
